author: Franco Collino
comment: Installed on Samsung Gear Live, I'm able to customize colors, however any of the options on the watch face only activate the OK Google option.. I tried settings different options but none work.. Am I doing something wrong? Do I need to somehow disable the OK Google option for the options in the center of the watch face to work?

author: Waqas Ullah
comment: Love this watch face, my only gripe is that I wish the colour of the watchface itself (not just the hands, numbers and digital display background) could be changed from the dark brown it comes with.
title: Very nice watch face

author: Nicolas De Smyter
comment: The watch face was always crashing. Couldn't even finish configuring or it crashed. And now I'm not even able to run it from scratch anymore

author: Adam Beckom
comment: Stability seems to be big problem. I downloaded it for my Sony Smartwatch 3. It constantly lags and stops running. Ultimately it will restart the watch. The faces are really nice, but with the stability issues I will uninstall it. Good effort overall.
title: Stability is a problem, but nice faces

comment: Considering I Paid money for this, I  feel that it's flaky and unstable nature has a lot to be desired. I have better free watch faces. Very dissapointed. Using on a LG Urbane.
title: Not very stable

author: Glen M Uren
comment: Used with LG urbane crashed constantly, not sure why never had a watch app do this before.  Need updating badly.
title: Crashed a lot

author: Tushal Bhadang
comment: The design is nice but the app failed to work properly on the Huawei watch, keeps crashing.... disappointed....c'mon guys fix it up....this face has potential!
title: Good concept...

author: Paul Green
comment: Never actually got to use the watch face as it just kept crashing.
title: Constant crashing

author: z ed
comment: It looks nice when its not crashing pluse its a battery hungry watch
title: It crashes it freezes and crashes  very often

author: Alfred Dipace
comment: Keeps crashing on my Huawei
title: Poor stabilty

author: Ricardo Moraza
comment: Mini launcher, panic button a lot of features. A must have
title: The best that I have used jet

author: Mark Antony Clarke
comment: On a Moto 360 2nd Gen liked it but stopped working.
title: Stopped working.. Blank Screen

author: Bill Dieffenbacher
comment: Found out why it didn't work so good  so I downloaded another app that goes with the watch and it works great I love it
title: Stoppage

author: Jose Hernandez
comment: Are you guys going to fix it?
title: Watchface has stopped error. Please fix it, I love this watchface!!

author: Charlie Briggs
comment: The app force closes on the watch and leaves me with a blank display. The watch face is nearly unusable. Fantastic watch face though otherwise.
title: Great watch face buuut

author: Joseph M
comment: If it would stay working. Huawei watch keeps throwing an error mini wear has stopped woking.
title: Love the design

author: neil Bailey
comment: Fix doesn't work properly.
title: Weather forecasts won't load, keep saying error, keep trying, but still nothing happens??

author: Michael Truong
comment: "Watch face has stopped" message appearing. Can't seem to get the watch face to work. Only way is to uninstall and reinstall app. This means I can't change any settings otherwise the message will appear again.

reply.author: Mini Launcher
reply.content:
Hi Michael,

Thanks for the feedback and sorry for the inconvenience, we will look into this issue and fix it as soon as possible, thanks!

title: Watch face stopped?

author: Chris Nixon
comment: Brilliant. Been using Mini Launcher for months and only just found this. Now I've got on-screen buttons for Agenda, Weather & Stopwatch!  A better selection of watch hands would be my only suggestion for this excellent app.

author: Trent Sanden
comment: I installed this for the first time and right away it crashes on my moto 360. Uninstall right away
title: Wow

author: Jacob Bondt
comment: Piece of junk does not at all.please remove this junk from play store
title: Sony SW 3 watch

author: Kirsten Rossman
comment: Great look on the watch but it keeps crashing. Easily one it my favorites but I can't use it.

author: Joe Gutierrez
comment: Keeps crashing ever time I try to customize.

author: Rene Koch
comment: Crashes alot, and its ambient mode isn't that great

author: Jack Laney
comment: Wanted a watch face that was free and had a couple of interactive features, exactly what this. Fantastic.
title: Perfect

comment: Forcecloses

author: Gaurav Bammi
comment: Crashes

author: Mark Ocondi
comment: Crashes

author: Johan Rocklind
comment: Crashes

author: Matthew Wheeler
comment: After reinstalling the watch face, all features are working properly on my Moto 360 and Nexus 5.

reply.author: Mini Launcher
reply.content:
Hi Matthew,
Thanks for your review and feedback, glad you like this watch face, have a good day!

title: Works great

author: DeWitt Family
comment: Very useful, and what I was hoping for when interactive faces were announced. Would love option to disable digital clock though. Why do so many wear faces have analog and digital by default? I only need one or the other to tell the time. Thanks for a great watchface that uses mini launcher and so many other app opening options!

reply.author: Mini Launcher
reply.content:
Hi DeWitt,

Thanks for your compliment and suggestion, we'll definitely consider the digital clock option you mentioned, stay tuned!

title: Utility is awesome!

author: Tom D'Roza
comment: Would be five stars if the face made better use of square screens (Sony SW3)

reply.author: Mini Launcher
reply.content:
Hi Tom,

Sorry for the inconvenience, but yes we are already working on optimization for square watches and will have a update real soon, looking forward to your 5-star!

title: Great features, but poor support for square watches

author: Cedell Hendricks
comment: I was very surprised by this watch face. I am using it currently. Does just about all that I want but I wish it was better suited to square screens.

reply.author: Mini Launcher
reply.content:
Hi Cedell,
Thanks for your feedback, better square watches support is coming real soon, stay tuned!

title: Square support request

author: Joey Sack
comment: Watch face is super customizable and I love all of the app made by this developer. Good job!
title: Love this

author: Patrick Brayne
comment: But would love square watch support

reply.author: Mini Launcher
reply.content:
Hi Patrick,
Thanks for your feedback, we are working hard on optimization for square watches and will have a update real soon, stay tuned!

title: Decent watch face

author: Gustav Palsson
comment: I had to uninstall because it kept crashing. You can however install the launcher app and get the watchfaces from there and use them without any trouble. Sadly you can't configure them like you can with this app, but it just doesn't work when it crashes all the time. Huawei Watch 0750 Android Wear 1.5.2954763  Android 6.0.1

author: Mister Junky
comment: Where is the sweep second hand and with all the options in the watch face settings why is there  no option for having larger analog numbers as well as the option to remove the outer grey round ring which would make a lot more room for longer watch hands as well as having bigger 1 to 12 o'clock numbers with the abiliity to change the sizes of the analog clock''s numeric 1 to 12 numbers all of which would really make a big improvement to the cosmetic appearance of the watch as well as making room for at least two additional options for the watch battery percentage and the weather without losing the ability for quick launch of the mini launcher and the right hand side option for an additional quick launch app.  Thanks!

author: Sean Bianchi
comment: Keeps crashing on my watch, can't use, would like to see how it does but crashes after 5 seconds then just black screen
title: Keeps crashing

author: Dan F
comment: Used on a zenwatch 2 and a galaxy s7 edge, constantly crashed and couldn't even use the face
title: Constantly crashes

author: Jus Me
comment: Watch face has stopped message came up over and over. Uninstalled.
title: Crashed
